rules_text: {T}, Sacrifice Fixed Point in Reality: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. You may conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. If you do, untap that land. [i](It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]No matter what, some things don't change.[/i]
